com.w2.api.engine.operators

Class CommandSetSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w2.api.engine.operators.CommandSetSequence

  • public class CommandSetSequence
extends java.lang.Object
    A sequence of RobotCommandSet that will be executed one after another.

    • Method Detail

      • addCommandSet

        public void addCommandSet(double durationSecs,
                 RobotCommandSet commandSet)
        Insert a given `RobotCommandSet` object at the end of this sequence.
        Parameters:
        commandSet - The 'RobotCommandSet' object to add to the end of the sequence. No-op if the object is empty/null.
        durationSecs - Duration for how long to execute `RobotCommandSet`, in seconds. The duration must be greater than 30ms.

      • addFrame

        public void addFrame(CommandSetSequenceFrame frame)
        Insert a given `CommandSetSequenceFrame` at the end of this sequence.
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame object to add to the end of the sequence.
